name: The Errand
description:
A moonless night only happens once every four years. That night is here once again as you plan to keep true to a promise made eight years ago. This task never gets any easier, or so you thought. As you are granted a gift, you prepare to embark on this regrettable mission. You dread it, but you know the trial is worth it.

~~~~~~

"The Errand" is an RPG horror game with battle and puzzle elements. It's a short horror experience with custom artwork and music compositions all made by one person.

~~~~~~

Save your game by interacting with these tree stumps.

~~~~~~

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Space bar to confirm

"X" key to cancel or access the menu

(using your mouse is not recommended)
